Control Name: 15.1.1 Information security policy for supplier relationships
Control Statement: Review the policies, processes, practices and records relating to the management of supplier relationships involving outsourced IT and cloud, logistics, utilities, HR, medical, financial, legal and other services with significant information risk, security or compliance implications.
